actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the tariff schedules to provide for mixed animal feeds containing soybeans.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to redefine "mixed animal feeds" and "mixed feed ingredients": (1) to include soybeans and soybeans products as well as grains; and (2) to exclude such grain and soybean products when mixed with milk, milk products, or milk derivatives.

titles.title: A bill to amend the tariff schedules to provide for mixed animal feeds containing soybeans.
